name: 30DaysofSomethingNew
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Join us as we learn for the sake of learning! This briefing delivers a new fact each day. Every month we will be exploring a new topic. Topics encompass the sciences, health, food, travel, mountaineering, hiking, exploration and adventure.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
